text: Neotermes is a genus of termites in the Kalotermitidae family. ==Species== * Neotermes castaneus (Burmeister, 1839) * Neotermes connexus Snyder, 1922 * Neotermes greeni (Desneux, 1908) * Neotermes holmgreni Banks, 1918 * Neotermes jouteli (Banks in Banks and Snyder, 1920) * Neotermes kemneri Roonwal & Sen- Sarma, 1960 * Neotermes larseni (Light, 1935) * Neotermes luykxi Nickle and Collins, 1989 ==References== Category:Termite genera
title: Neotermes
